saran enda silwata erehiwa wiktar ayiwan siddhiya sambandhayen rawaye lipi palawana wita ewaka nithipathiwaraya wuye pasuwa agawinisuru bawata path sarath nanda silwaya.siddhiye sathya asathyathawa soyanu wenuwata rawaya kathuwarayata erehiwa nithimaya kriya marga ganima sandaha mahesthrathwarayata upades dena thanata nithipathiwaraya pathwa sitiyeya.aparadhakaruwata erehiwa nithiya kriyathmaka kirima wenuwata adala aparadhaya helidaraw kala madhyawediyata erehiwa nithiya kriyawe yedawima ekala athishaya samanya siduwimak wiya.elesa nithiya ha adhikaranaya pawulaka ho sima sahitha dushithayin pirisaka athakoluwak bawata pathwa thibu kalaya ikuth 2015 janawari 08 wenidayin awasanwi yayi bohodena sithuha.

buduhu rudhi balayen abhirupa sampanna sthri sharirayak mawa eya jarawata yana andama dakwa sanwegaya upadawa gatha desu seka.gatha awasanayehi abhirupa nanda arhath bhawayata elambauna ya.leda wa kiliti wa kunu wa yana me sirura bala nandawaniekanga wu sitha thara wa pihita asuba lesa gena bala manethilakunehi sitha yodawamin athi mamathwaya duru karaminedurara manaya shantha wa giya sithin wasaya kala manearhath bhawayata pamina thama ma udana washayen mema gatha prakasha kala ya.abhirupa nanda theraniyange giya yi.kusum disanayakagampala karagala shi්ra jinawansharamaye shi්ra mahanama daham pasale 2013 warshaye thagi pradana uthsawaya ha 10 wani sanwathsaraya pasugiyada pawathwini.

oya koyika wunath deparak nositha bandagena kalla pahath wenakam uduburana saha hure danna ape mahajanathawa kiyana mi harak rala sadi pahadi sitithi.meyakarayen oonama kuppa kriyawak mokak ho baba pat ekak dama yata gasimata ho uda damima deshapalana wedikawe maha kajjak nowe.
